column5: Its your last cast EVER...what lure/presentation will you use to catch the following? ;  1. Walleye  2. Muskie  3. Perch  4. Pike  5. Smallie  my answers, 1. crawler harness with a drift 2. BIG bucktail  3. Jig tipped with worm, 4. Daredevil  5. mepps  If all fails, I'll try some underwater demolition.
1. bucktail/minnow 2. musky killer 3. micro tube under a float 4. spinnerbait 5. tube jig
A spinner bait will work for all the above. If its my last cast!!  dsn
well the only way it's my last cast ever  is ..I would have to be dieing that day     so I am trolling with 100 dollar bills on Javis  St.    do they still hang out down there
I hear they do still hang out there Terry. Though I'm told..... HE says you need $200.00 now.
Plastics!  ..C4 to be exact...  might as well go out with a BANG!!!   btw... sounds like Tewrry wants to go out with a bang too.
1. Mepps Black Fury #5 2. Mepps Black Fury #5 3. Mepps Black Fury #5 4. Mepps Black Fury #5 5. Mepps Black Fury #5
MY HOMEMADE WORM HARNESSES..  ..and i have caught all of those and lake trout with my harnesses...so its gotta be them for sure.....cheers
